text: Uye kana ndima dzedu dziri pachena (maAayaat) dzikaverengwa kwavari avo vasingatendi (vapfumi vakarasika pamaQuraish), vanoti kune vanotenda (varombo pavateedzeri vamutumwa Muhammad (SAW)): “Nderipi pamapato maviri aya (revatendi nevasingatendi) ririnani pachinzvimbo uye rakanakisisa pachiteshi (nzvimbo yekupana mazano)?”
